reviewText:
In the porn world today many films come out that seems to be like watching robots having sex.  Moving from position to position, caring little to nothing about the characters story or emotions.  This film on the other hand, follows one woman down her spiral into lust and obsession.  And to follow her down there is one of the best soundtracks I've heard, a strong Jazz piece by Alden Shuman.

This film is explicit showing everything and anything, but one thing I found to be erotic and emotional was that it would have scenes about certain fetishes or positions and not go into a full scene as they do now giving the film pace. From that the character could explore these things giving her the right to be in hell, as she wanted.

But all in all I would recommend this erotic film because it has a soul as much as it has an erotic edge.  Giving the character strength and the film appeal.  Though this film is erotic there much much more to it.
